article: Jack had gone to the university to study history , but he kept playing all the time and at the end of his first year , his history professor failed him in his exams . He was so poor at his subject that he would have to leave the university . However , his father made up his mind that he would go to see the professor to ask him to let Jack go on his studies the next year . " He ' s a good boy , " said the father , " and if you let him pass this time , I ' m sure he ' ll improve a lot next year and pass the exam at the end of it really well . " " No , no , that ' s quite impossible . " said the professor at once , " Do you know , last month I asked him when Napoleon had died , and he did n ' t know ! " " Please , sir , give him another chance . " said Jack ' s father . " You see , I ' m afraid we do n ' t take any newspapers in our house , so none of us even know that Napoleon was ill . "
questions: In " at the end of it " , the word " it " means

model: jack ' s father was not good at his subjects
jack ' s second year in university
human: Jack ' s first year in university
Jack ' s second year in university
